Greetings to Equatorial Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Equatorial Guinean President 
     Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, President of Equatorial Guinea, on Oct. 7 on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of its independence.
 In the belief that the good friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished the president and the people of the country greater success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK government delegation leaves for Syria
articles.content:
DPRK government delegation leaves for Syria 
     Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government scientific and technological delegation led by Ri Kwang Ho, president of the academy of sciences, left here today to visit Syria.
 The delegation is also scheduled to participate in the 8th meeting of the third world academies of sciences to be held in India.

articles.content:
KCNA delegation leaves for Iran 
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The KCNA delegation led by its vice-director general Kim Pyong Ho left here today to participate in the international forum of world news agencies-coalition for peace to be held in Iran.
